appendix.title: OPERATING FORMS-2 WITH CP/M
appendix.para: To clarify the sequences, the CP/M prompts are included before the commands in this Appendix. The symbol << indicates that the RETURN key or equivalent should be pressed once.
It is assumed that CP/M is loaded, and that the issued files have been copied to the CIS COBOL CP/M system disk.

note.para: FORMS-2 is preconfigured for your CRT. It can be reconfigured if necessary for any other special CRT.
